definition: tongue-twister
to wind/to coil (thread)/to rotate around/to spiral/to move around/to go round (an obstacle)/to by-pass/to make a detour/to confuse/to perplex
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
classifier for a ream of paper
see 令狐[Ling2 hu2]
see 脊令[ji2 ling2]
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)

sentences.english: You may try the tongue twister.
Can you read the following tongue twisters fluently?
sentences.chinese: 你能流利地朗讀下面的繞口令嗎？

sentences.english: He makes fun of me. but I'm a big fan of your aqua velva commercials.
sentences.chinese: 他在開我玩笑，不過我更欣賞你的繞口令表演。

sentences.english: Choose the No. from 10 tongue twisters in turn.
sentences.chinese: 小組輪流每次從10句繞口令中選取一個句子號碼。

sentences.english: I found some 4)tongue twisters to help my pronunciation.
sentences.chinese: 我找到一些繞口令來幫助練習我的發音。

sentences.english: We always practice our pronunciation with a tongue twister at the beginning of every lesson.
sentences.chinese: 每節課開始時我們總是用繞口令來練習發音。

sentences.english: Nest, I to a English tongue twisty everybody.
sentences.chinese: 下面，我爲大家讀一首英語繞口令。

sentences.english: I find English tongue twisters pleasant to learn.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得英語繞口令學起來很有意思。

sentences.english: Tongue twisters always frustrate me because I cannot say them correctly.
sentences.chinese: 繞口令一向讓我很頭大，因爲我總是說錯。

sentences.english: Tongue twister is a language game.
sentences.chinese: 繞口令是一種語言遊戲。

sentences.english: The moment Master Chou finished his incredible tongue twister, audiences just went buzzing.
sentences.chinese: 周師傅一表演繞口令絕技之後觀衆就沸騰了。

sentences.english: Exercises like tongue twisters can help improve your flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 做一些如繞口令的練習可以幫助改善你的靈活性。

definition: to write from memory
genre of song-and-dance duet popular in northeast China
pleasing to the ear
(spoken) Chinese language
nonsyllabic final r 儿 added to a word in spoken Chinese/also called retroflex final or r-ization
attributive (modifier)
ability/skill
to mime/a dumb show
to mention/to bring up (a subject)/with regard to/as for
demure/prudish/hypocritical
to get straight to the point (idiom)
vulgar language (esp. scatological insults)/uncultured speech
When you enter a country, follow the local customs (idiom); do as the natives do/When in Rome, do as the Romans do
see 驢唇不對馬嘴|驴唇不对马嘴[lu:2 chun2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3]
pinyin: niu2 tou2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3

definition: lit. to hate iron for not becoming steel/to feel resentful towards sb for failing to meet expectations and impatient to see improvement (idiom)
saying in which the second part, uttered after a pause or totally left out, is the intended meaning of the allegory presented in the first part
